title: hi ,could you help
body_html:
i simply pull the image with nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch/pytorch:latest
on my mac ,the version is 10.13.6 and with the Intel HD Graphics 6000
i want to build pytorch with cuda support.but it failed with following error
Step 4/12 : RUN curl -o ~/miniconda.sh -O https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && chmod +x ~/miniconda.sh && ~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && rm ~/miniconda.sh && /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y python=$PYTHON_VERSION numpy pyyaml scipy ipython mkl mkl-include cython typing && /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y -c pytorch magma-cuda90 && /opt/conda/bin/conda clean -ya
---> Running in 82dbab749b36
% Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current
Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed
0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 --:--:-- 0:00:19 --:--:-- 0curl: (6) Could not resolve host: repo.continuum.io
The command '/bin/sh -c curl -o ~/miniconda.sh -O https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && chmod +x ~/miniconda.sh && ~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && rm ~/miniconda.sh && /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y python=$PYTHON_VERSION numpy pyyaml scipy ipython mkl mkl-include cython typing && /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y -c pytorch magma-cuda90 && /opt/conda/bin/conda clean -ya' returned a non-zero code: 6

i simply pull the image with nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch/pytorch:latest
on my mac ,the version is 10.13.6 and with the Intel HD Graphics 6000
i want to build pytorch with cuda support.but it failed with following error

body:
i simply pull the image with nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch/pytorch:latest
on my mac ,the version is 10.13.6 and with the Intel HD Graphics 6000
i want to build pytorch with cuda support.but it failed with following error 
Step 4/12 : RUN curl -o ~/miniconda.sh -O  https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh  &&      chmod +x ~/miniconda.sh &&      ~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda &&      rm ~/miniconda.sh &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y python=$PYTHON_VERSION numpy pyyaml scipy ipython mkl mkl-include cython typing &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y -c pytorch magma-cuda90 &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda clean -ya

The command '/bin/sh -c curl -o ~/miniconda.sh -O  https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh  &&      chmod +x ~/miniconda.sh &&      ~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda &&      rm ~/miniconda.sh &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y python=$PYTHON_VERSION numpy pyyaml scipy ipython mkl mkl-include cython typing &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y -c pytorch magma-cuda90 &&      /opt/conda/bin/conda clean -ya' returned a non-zero code: 6
